variable.name: VERS
variable.description: Form Version

variable.name: PHQ1
variable.description: Are you familiar with the decedent's medical history?

variable.name: PHQ3A
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Angina pectoris or coronary insufficiency

variable.name: PHQ3B
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Valvular disease or cardiomyopathy

variable.name: PHQ3C
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Coronary bypass surgery

variable.name: PHQ3D
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Coronary angioplasty

variable.name: PHQ3E
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Hypertension

variable.name: PHQ3F
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Myocardial infarction

variable.name: PHQ3H
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Other chronic ischemic heart disease

variable.name: PHQ3I
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Stroke (CVA)

variable.name: PHQ3K
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Any non-cardiac condition that might have contributed to this death

variable.name: PHQ3L
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Diabetes

variable.name: PHQ3M
variable.description: Did the decedent have a history of any of the following? Cigarette smoking

variable.name: PHQ4A
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Nitrates

variable.name: PHQ4B
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Calcium channel blockers

variable.name: PHQ4C
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Digitalis

variable.name: PHQ4D
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Beta-blockers

variable.name: PHQ4E
variable.description: Was the decedent taking any of the following medications within four weeks prior to death? Other cardiovascular drugs

variable.name: PHQ5
variable.description: Are you familiar with the events surrounding the decedent's death?

variable.name: PHQ6
variable.description: Did you witness the death?

variable.name: PHQ7A
variable.description: Was there any pain in the chest, left arm or shoulder or jaw within 72 hours of death?

variable.name: PHQ7B
variable.description: Did the pain include the chest?

variable.name: PHQ7C
variable.description: Did you think this pain was of a cardiac origin?

variable.name: PHQ8
variable.description: Did the decedent take (or was he/she given) nitrates at the time of the acute episode?

variable.name: PHQ9
variable.description: Was coronary reperfusion (intravenous or intracoronary streptokinase or TPA, angioplasty, etc.) attempted during the acute episode?

variable.name: PHQ10
variable.description: Was CPR and/or cardioversion performed within 24 hours of death?

variable.name: PHQ11
variable.description: Please give time between onset of acute symptoms to death. (We are defining death as the point where spontaneous breathing ceased and the patient never recovered.)
variable.value: At least 12 but less than 24 hours
At least 4 but less than 12 hours
At least 1 but less than 4 hours

variable.name: PHQ12
variable.description: Would you classify the decedent's cause of death as due to CHD?

variable.name: PHQ13A
variable.description: If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Pulmonary embolism

variable.name: PHQ13B
variable.description: If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Acute pulmonary edema

variable.name: PHQ13C
variable.description: If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Stroke

variable.name: PHQ13D
variable.description: If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Pneumonia

variable.name: PHQ13E
variable.description: If no, what do you believe to be the cause of death? Other

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: FSEQNO
variable.description: Form sequence number

variable.name: LINENO
variable.description: Line number

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: PHQ15FUT
variable.description: Date form completed

variable.name: PHQ3JYR
variable.description: If yes, date of most recent event?

variable.name: GARNETID
variable.description: GARNET ID
